name: drupal/respond_40x_error_code
description: The respond_40x_error_code module forces your Drupal site's 403 and 404 pages to respond with an actual 403 or 404 response code. By default, if you assign a node for those custom error pages, it will respond with a 200 status code. Note: this module is not intended for use if Fast404 or another 404 module/custom implementation is in place.
